TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/SelectedListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示在列表视图控件中选定项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of selected items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个存储中的选定的项控件。A stores the selected items in a control. 项目存储在项包含在。The items stored in the are items contained in the . 将显示在所有项都存储。The stores all items displayed in the . 下表显示了如何的示例中存储的项以及其所选内容状态的一个示例控件。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states in an example control. |索引Index|项Item|在 ListView 中选择状态Selection state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-------------------------------------| |00|item1Item1|未选定Unselected| |11|item2Item2|已选定Selected| |22|item3Item3|未选定Unselected| |33|Item4Item4|已选定Selected| |44|Item5Item5|已选定Selected| 基于上表中的示例下, 表演示了如何将会显示。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中选定的项Selected item in the ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|-------------------------------------------------| |00|item2Item2| |11|Item4Item4| |22|Item5Item5| 可以使用的属性和此类的方法来执行各种任务的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法使您能够确定的某个项是否类是的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道该项目已在集合中，可以使用方法，以确定中项的位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用，事件，并成员和类。The following code example demonstrates using the , event, and members and the class. 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中包含的窗体名为对象`ListView1`和一个名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or the event handler. 此示例需要该事件处理程序与正确关联事件This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可确定中选定项的数量控件。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the control. 遍历集合的值时，然后可以使用此值，需要提供要执行循环的迭代次数。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非的属性设置为`true`，此属性始终返回零 (0) 或一 （1） 具体取决于您是否有选定的项的值。Unless the property of the is set to `true`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应的键中。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 密钥的比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1. 如果项的调用，最后一个索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，但如果没有匹配项，则搜索开始的集合的开始处返回。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
